afk.showAfkIndicator: Should an AFK emoji indicator be displayed in the Players list?
afk.showChatNotification: Should a message be posted to chat when a player is AFK?
afk.showChatActivityRemoveAFK: If you are AFK and post a chat message, should the AFK indicator go away?
afk.iconPosition: Where should the AFK symbol be displayed?

typing.timeOutSec: Reset typing after x seconds after last character
typing.iconPosition: Where should the tap icon be displayed?
